comments:
3.1RC2 June 10th 0010 build

- start a brand new eclipse
- use the Plug-in Project creation wizard to create a Hello World project
- Open Type "SchemeEvent" and show it in the hierarchy view (it's a jface class
whose source is not actually in the workspace)
- select SchemeEvent in the hierarchy view, right-click->Refactor->Use Supertype
Where Possible...
- press OK
- press OK again, and you'll get the following exception:
